name: Save Dave (Gian "BulmasBF" Collica)
description:
Save Dave is a light Tower Defence game with a heavy medical theme. The player is tasked with performing surgery on a patient by placing surgical turrets to kill diseases.

This was a recent University project where we were tasked with making a small game designed for mobile platforms.

The production time from Pre- Production to Release was 12 Weeks.

Team Size: 3.

My role(s) on this project were: Design Lead, Artist & Animator,  Secondary Programmer.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Entirely Mouse Driven.

Left Click on turret platforms to purchase turrets.

Left Click on existing turrets to purchase upgrades.

For a more detailed tutorial explanation see the pause menu.

Alt + F4 closes the application.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It is recommended to launch the game through the Itch.io app for ease of use. 

If downloading manually navigate to the build file and run the .exe file to launch the game. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
